thread.section_title: Burgers' Smokehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Burgers' Smokehouse | smokehouse.com | 2 of 171
thread.title: Kathy

author: Kathy
title: Kathy
text: City Ham Shanks are THE best! I've ordered them twice and will continue to order. So versatile from beans to soup. But, even though the sauced pulled pork and the sauced pulled chicken were very good I will not order those again due to price. Browsing Burger's Smokehouse's catalog will make your taste buds come alive! So many items to choose from, but cost prohibitive for me.
